description:
Increase atmospheric carbon dioxide by 1% per. year to quadrupling then hold fixed for 200 years in a model with interactive ice sheets.
Run for a minimum of 350 years (500 years encouraged).
keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, 1% per yr CO2, quadrupled CO2, interactive ISM, interactive ice sheets
long_name: 1% per yr CO2 increase to quadrupling with interactive ice sheets
rationale: For analysis of the coupled ice sheet-climate system.

requirements.description: Begin in pre-industrial era and run for a minimum of 350 years, up to 500 years
requirements.label: 1851-2200 350yrs minimum

requirements.description: 1% per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling.
requirements.label: 1%yrCO2Increase

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: PIForcingExcludingCO2

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the pre-industrial control with interactive ice sheets
requirements.label: PreIndustrialISMInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model with interactive ice sheets
requirements.keywords: AOGCM-ISM, ESM-ISM, Atmosphere-Ocean-IceSheet, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM-ISM Configuration
